description: Now that Well and the others are 15-year-old adults, they officially form their adventuring party, the Dragon Busters. However, before they have time to enjoy adventuring they receive a mandatory quest from the kingdom and venture deep into ancient underground ruins that no one has yet to return from alive. Well and the others are transported deep underground by a trap, and what awaits them there is...

titles.title: Presumed Dead? Are You Kidding Me?!
Présumé mort ? Dites-moi que je rêve !
Shibou Totte, Sore wa Nai Deshou!
死亡説って, それはないでしょう!
